name: Erosion #5
description:
"erosion" is a limited edition, experimental sound series. 
All erosion audio recordings were made using a technique similar to that used in Alvin Lucier's "I'm sitting in a room."
Articulate audio was amplified into a room and recorded and that recording was then played back and recorded... this process continues until the articulate sound is fuzzy and ambient and unrecognizable. The order was then reversed, so that the end is at the beginning and the beginning is at the end. 
Audio and gif by dustin hamman. Copyright 2021. please do not use sound or visual without permission. 
Owner of NFT is free to use either for non-commercial projects only, as long as they own the NFT.
